General.Name: Sinkang Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinkang Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stainless steel in Taiwan and internationally. It primarily offers stainless steel sheets/coils, wire rods, and tubes. The company also provides stainless steel plate/coil shearing, coil slitting, plate surface treatment, mirror finishing, and embossing forming, as well as round tube and angle bar forming services. Its products are used in the construction and tableware, mobile devices, and appliances, as well as in the petrochemical, food, medical equipment, transportation equipment, electrical equipment, office equipment, and machinery manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Da'an Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 242065
